verses.verse: וַיֹּסִ֙פוּ֙ <WH3254> again בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> did הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיִּתְּנֵ֧ם <WH5414> delivered יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> and the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> them into the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> of the Philistines אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years פ

וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> become אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> man אֶחָ֧ד <WH259> And there was a certain מִצָּרְעָ֛ה <WH6881> of Zorah מִמִּשְׁפַּ֥חַת <WH4940> of the family הַדָּנִ֖י <WH1839> of the Danites וּשְׁמ֣וֹ <WH8034> whose name מָנ֑וֹחַ <WH4495> [was] Manoah וְאִשְׁתּ֥וֹ <WH802> and his wife עֲקָרָ֖ה <WH6135> [was] barren וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> no יָלָֽדָה׃ <WH3205> and bare

וַיֵּרָ֥א <WH7200> appeared מַלְאַךְ־ <WH4397> And the angel יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> unto the woman וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵלֶ֗יהָ <WH413> to her הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold נָ֤א <WH4994> now אַתְּ־ <WH859> you עֲקָרָה֙ <WH6135> unto her Behold now thou [art] barren וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> no יָלַ֔דְתְּ <WH3205> and bearest וְהָרִ֖ית <WH2029> not but thou shalt conceive וְיָלַ֥דְתְּ <WH3205> and bear בֵּֽן׃ <WH1121> a son

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now הִשָּׁ֣מְרִי <WH8104> Now therefore beware נָ֔א <WH4994> I beseech thee וְאַל־ <WH408> nor תִּשְׁתִּ֖י <WH8354> I pray thee and drink יַ֣יִן <WH3196> not wine וְשֵׁכָ֑ר <WH7941> nor strong drink וְאַל־ <WH408> nor תֹּאכְלִ֖י <WH398> and eat כָּל־ <WH3605> any טָמֵֽא׃ <WH2931> not any unclean

כִּי֩ <WH3588> For הִנָּ֨ךְ <WH2009> behold הָרָ֜ה <WH2029> been וְיֹלַ֣דְתְּ <WH3205> and bear בֵּ֗ן <WH1121> a son וּמוֹרָה֙ <WH4177> and no razor לֹא־ <WH3808> and no יַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> shall come עַל־ <WH5921> upon רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <WH7218> on his head כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נְזִ֧יר <WH5139> shall be a Nazarite אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> unto God יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become הַנַּ֖עַר <WH5288> for the child מִן־ <WH4480> from הַבָּ֑טֶן <WH990> from the womb וְה֗וּא <WH1931> and he יָחֵ֛ל <WH2490> and he shall begin לְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <WH3467> to deliver אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> out of the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> of the Philistines

וַתָּבֹ֣א <WH935> came הָאִשָּׁ֗ה <WH802> Then the woman וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and told לְאִישָׁהּ֮ <WH376> her husband לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> saying אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> A man הָאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God בָּ֣א <WH935> came אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me וּמַרְאֵ֕הוּ <WH4758> unto me and his countenance כְּמַרְאֵ֛ה <WH4758> [was] like the countenance מַלְאַ֥ךְ <WH4397> of an angel הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God נוֹרָ֣א <WH3372> terrible מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> very וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> nor שְׁאִלְתִּ֙יהוּ֙ <WH7592> but I asked אֵֽי־ <WH335> where מִזֶּ֣ה <WH2088> he ה֔וּא <WH1931> he וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> he me his name לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor הִגִּ֥יד <WH5046> him not whence he [was] neither told לִֽי׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> But he said לִ֔י הִנָּ֥ךְ <WH2009> Behold הָרָ֖ה <WH2029> been וְיֹלַ֣דְתְּ <WH3205> and bear בֵּ֑ן <WH1121> a son וְעַתָּ֞ה <WH6258> and now אַל־ <WH408> nor תִּשְׁתִּ֣י ׀ <WH8354> nor strong drink יַ֣יִן <WH3196> no wine וְשֵׁכָ֗ר <WH7941> and now drink וְאַל־ <WH408> nor תֹּֽאכְלִי֙ <WH398> neither eat כָּל־ <WH3605> any טֻמְאָ֔ה <WH2932> any unclean כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נְזִ֤יר <WH5139> shall be a Nazarite אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> to God יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become הַנַּ֔עַר <WH5288> [thing] for the child מִן־ <WH4480> from הַבֶּ֖טֶן <WH990> from the womb עַד־ <WH5704> against י֥וֹם <WH3117> to the day מוֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH4194> of his death פ

וַיֶּעְתַּ֥ר <WH6279> intreated מָנ֛וֹחַ <WH4495> Then Manoah אֶל־ <WH413> about יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said בִּ֣י <WH994> O אֲדוֹנָ֔י <WH136> my Lord אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֞ים <WH430> of God אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom שָׁלַ֗חְתָּ <WH7971> which thou didst send יָבוֹא־ <WH935> come again נָ֥א <WH4994> let עוֹד֙ <WH5750> again אֵלֵ֔ינוּ <WH413> about וְיוֹרֵ֕נוּ <WH3384> unto us and teach מַֽה־ <WH4100> what נַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> us what we shall do לַנַּ֥עַר <WH5288> unto the child הַיּוּלָּֽד׃ <WH3205> that shall be born

וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> hearkened הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> And God בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> to the voice מָנ֑וֹחַ <WH4495> of Manoah וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> came again מַלְאַךְ֩ <WH4397> and the angel הָאֱלֹהִ֨ים <WH430> of God ע֜וֹד <WH5750> again אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאִשָּׁ֗ה <WH802> unto the woman וְהִיא֙ <WH1931> she יוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> as she sat בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> in the field וּמָנ֥וֹחַ <WH4495> but Manoah אִישָׁ֖הּ <WH376> her husband אֵ֥ין <WH369> else עִמָּֽהּ׃ <WH5973> with

וַתְּמַהֵר֙ <WH4116> made haste הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH376> her husband וַתָּ֖רָץ <WH7323> and ran וַתַּגֵּ֣ד <WH5046> and shewed לְאִישָׁ֑הּ <WH802> And the woman וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> about הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold נִרְאָ֤ה <WH7200> hath appeared אֵלַי֙ <WH413> about הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> unto him Behold the man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּ֥א <WH935> unto me that came בַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> unto me the [other] day אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> about

וַיָּ֛קָם <WH6965> arose וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> Then מָנ֖וֹחַ <WH4495> And Manoah אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <WH802> his wife וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> and came אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> to the man וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said ל֗וֹ הַאַתָּ֥ה <WH859> are you הָאִ֛ישׁ <WH376> unto him [Art] thou the man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who דִּבַּ֥רְתָּ <WH1696> that spakest אֶל־ <WH413> about הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> his wife וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> I

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said מָנ֔וֹחַ <WH4495> And Manoah עַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> Now יָבֹ֣א <WH935> come to pass דְבָרֶ֑יךָ <WH1697> Now let thy words מַה־ <WH4100> what יִּֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become מִשְׁפַּט־ <WH4941> How shall we order הַנַּ֖עַר <WH5288> the child וּמַעֲשֵֽׂהוּ׃ <WH4639> and [how] shall we do

וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> said מַלְאַ֥ךְ <WH4397> And the angel יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God אֶל־ <WH413> to מָנ֑וֹחַ <WH4495> unto Manoah מִכֹּ֛ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> i אָמַ֥רְתִּי <WH559> Of all that I said אֶל־ <WH413> about הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> unto the woman תִּשָּׁמֵֽר׃ <WH8104> let her beware

מִכֹּ֣ל <WH3605> anything אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that יֵצֵא֩ <WH3318> of any [thing] that cometh מִגֶּ֨פֶן <WH1612> of the vine הַיַּ֜יִן <WH3196> wine לֹ֣א <WH3808> should not תֹאכַ֗ל <WH398> She may not eat וְיַ֤יִן <WH3196> wine וְשֵׁכָר֙ <WH7941> or strong drink אַל־ <WH408> nor תֵּ֔שְׁתְּ <WH8354> neither let her drink וְכָל־ <WH3605> any טֻמְאָ֖ה <WH2932> any unclean אַל־ <WH408> nor תֹּאכַ֑ל <WH398> nor eat כֹּ֥ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> i צִוִּיתִ֖יהָ <WH6680> [thing] all that I commanded תִּשְׁמֹֽר׃ <WH8104> her let her observe

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said מָנ֖וֹחַ <WH4495> And Manoah אֶל־ <WH413> to מַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> unto the angel יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD נַעְצְרָה־ <WH6113> I pray thee let us detain נָּ֣א <WH4994> Please אוֹתָ֔ךְ <WH853> וְנַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> thee until we shall have made ready לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> for גְּדִ֥י <WH1423> kid עִזִּֽים׃ <WH5795> goat

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said מַלְאַ֨ךְ <WH4397> And the angel יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מָנ֗וֹחַ <WH4495> unto Manoah אִם־ <WH518> and if תַּעְצְרֵ֙נִי֙ <WH6113> Though thou detain לֹא־ <WH3808> I will not אֹכַ֣ל <WH398> me I will not eat בְּלַחְמֶ֔ךָ <WH3899> of thy bread וְאִם־ <WH518> if תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> thou wilt offer עֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> a burnt offering לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> it unto the LORD תַּעֲלֶ֑נָּה <WH5927> thou must offer כִּ֚י <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> did not יָדַ֣ע <WH3045> knew מָנ֔וֹחַ <WH4495> For Manoah כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מַלְאַ֥ךְ <WH4397> not that he [was] an angel יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said מָנ֛וֹחַ <WH4495> And Manoah אֶל־ <WH413> to מַלְאַ֥ךְ <WH4397> unto the angel יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD מִ֣י <WH4310> What שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <WH8034> What [is] thy name כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָבֹ֥א <WH935> come to pass [דִבְרֵיךָ כ] (דְבָרְךָ֖ <WH1697> act ק) וְכִבַּדְנֽוּךָ׃ <WH3513> we may do thee honour

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לוֹ֙ מַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> And the angel יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> Why זֶּ֖ה <WH2088> you תִּשְׁאַ֣ל <WH7592> unto him Why askest לִשְׁמִ֑י <WH8034> thou thus after my name וְהוּא־ <WH1931> he פֶֽלִאי׃ <WH6383> secret ס

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took מָנ֜וֹחַ <WH4495> So Manoah אֶת־ <WH853> גְּדִ֤י <WH1423> kid הָעִזִּים֙ <WH5795> goat וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּנְחָ֔ה <WH4503> with a meat offering וַיַּ֥עַל <WH5927> and offered עַל־ <WH5921> on הַצּ֖וּר <WH6697> [it] upon a rock לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וּמַפְלִ֣א <WH6381> wondrously לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <WH6213> and [the angel] did וּמָנ֥וֹחַ <WH4495> and Manoah וְאִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <WH802> and his wife רֹאִֽים׃ <WH7200> looked on

וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> came בַעֲל֨וֹת <WH5927> went up הַלַּ֜הַב <WH3851> For it came to pass when the flame מֵעַ֤ל <WH5921> from הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> from off the altar הַשָּׁמַ֔יְמָה <WH8064> toward heaven וַיַּ֥עַל <WH5927> ascended מַלְאַךְ־ <WH4397> that the angel יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּלַ֣הַב <WH3851> in the flame הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> of the altar וּמָנ֤וֹחַ <WH4495> And Manoah וְאִשְׁתּוֹ֙ <WH802> and his wife רֹאִ֔ים <WH7200> looked on וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <WH5307> [it] and fell on עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6440> their faces אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> to the ground

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no יָ֤סַף <WH3254> did no more עוֹד֙ <WH5750> again מַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> But the angel יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְהֵרָאֹ֖ה <WH7200> appear אֶל־ <WH413> to מָנ֣וֹחַ <WH4495> to Manoah וְאֶל־ <WH413> to אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <WH802> and to his wife אָ֚ז <WH227> Then יָדַ֣ע <WH3045> knew מָנ֔וֹחַ <WH4495> Then Manoah כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מַלְאַ֥ךְ <WH4397> that he [was] an angel יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said מָנ֛וֹחַ <WH4495> And Manoah אֶל־ <WH413> to his אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <WH802> unto his wife מ֣וֹת <WH4191> We shall surely נָמ֑וּת <WH4191> die כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God רָאִֽינוּ׃ <WH7200> because we have seen

וַתֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said ל֣וֹ אִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <WH802> But his wife לוּ֩ <WH3863> unto him If חָפֵ֨ץ <WH2654> were pleased יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD לַהֲמִיתֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH4191> to kill לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor לָקַ֤ח <WH3947> us he would not have received מִיָּדֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH3027> at our hands עֹלָ֣ה <WH5930> a burnt offering וּמִנְחָ֔ה <WH4503> and a meat offering וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor הֶרְאָ֖נוּ <WH7200> neither would he have shewed אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these וְכָעֵ֕ת <WH6256> us all these [things] nor would as at this time לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor הִשְׁמִיעָ֖נוּ <WH8085> have told כָּזֹֽאת׃ <WH2063> us [such things] as these

וַתֵּ֤לֶד <WH3205> bare הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> And the woman בֵּ֔ן <WH1121> a son וַתִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and called אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name שִׁמְשׁ֑וֹן <WH8123> Samson וַיִּגְדַּ֣ל <WH1431> grew הַנַּ֔עַר <WH5288> and the child וַֽיְבָרְכֵ֖הוּ <WH1288> blessed יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> and the LORD

וַתָּ֙חֶל֙ <WH2490> began ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> And the Spirit יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְפַעֲמ֖וֹ <WH6470> to move him at times בְּמַחֲנֵה־ <WH4264> in the camp דָ֑ן <WH1835> of Dan בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between צָרְעָ֖ה <WH6881> between Zorah וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between אֶשְׁתָּאֹֽל׃ <WH847> and Eshtaol פ
